website_summaries.verdict: Papaya and pineapple enzymes blend with coconut extract for a nourishing but deeply exfoliating experience.
pros: Cruelty-free and paraben-free formula that deep cleans and exfoliates effectively without being overly abrasive
Clears blackheads and dry skin patches with ease
cons: Some find the microbeads to be too abrasive for those with sensitive skin and contact lens wearers

customer_reviews.title: Contains Microbeads
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product especially because it states that it is non-abrasive. This is especially important for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes. This is an okay gel but it does contain microbeads of some kind. I thought at first they might be part of the formula that dissolves when used but they don't. It seems like a non-abrasive product would not contain microbeads that are meant to scrub the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Famous Dena

customer_reviews.title: Smooth glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: It’s important to exfoliate your face so that when you use your serums, oils and creams they can all be absorbed properly. This product is amazing. Immediately my dead skin was balling up and after washing off, my skin was glowing! Blackheads were removed and my dry skin patches smoothed. I slept with a moisture mask and in the morning I was like a new woman.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra L Plazas

customer_reviews.title: It’s weird (in a bad way)
customer_reviews.text: Super gross texture - the natural exfoliating fibers ball up on your skin in clumps. Imagine the consistency of soggy paper (think: spitball) on your face. This isn’t dead skin coming off, it’s just the odd consistency of this product. It’s hard to rinse off (feels like it left behind a residue) and doesn’t leave my skin feeling clean or softer. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger Reed

customer_reviews.title: Worth every single freaking penny!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the strangest yet most amazing face wash I have ever used! I have horrible combination skin and a lot I mean a lot of black and white heads and nothing works I’ve tried everything from proactive to store brands anything and everything I’ve tried! I saw a review on Buzzfeed for this and I figured why not and I’m so very glad I did! It does this weird thing we’re it peels off all the yucky crap off you’re face as you wash it and my skin is clearing so nice I could almost cry!! I will buy this and recommend it to anyone that has just about given up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Faith place-hodge

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This peel saved my skin!! I am breaking out after using a few products which were highly recommended on amazon. And I broke out in cystic acne and my skin became full and dry.. this scrub changed that for me just after using once. It’s non abrasive very gentle. And smells refreshing.. cruelty free!!! I have been using it twice a week. It got rid of my flaky dry skin around my chin and cheek area. Highly recommended. Will keep buying it!!
customer_reviews.author: charu walia

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would remove the dead skin from my face in little balls like some of the reviews state. Thats not what this does. The plant fibers nust ball up as you're rubbing this on your skin. Its gross, weird, and get everywhere. I feel like thus is a gimmick to make people believe they're removing layers of dead skin.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherlynn

customer_reviews.title: You guys. This stuff is 10/10 amazingly weird!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite youtubers recommended this face wash so I got it to try...and it’s AMAZING! I wasn’t sure what to expect because it looks like gel but when you rub it on your face- your gross, old dead skin peels away and makes your skin feel like butter. I was shocked!! I did it 3 times in a row and my face feels brand new. It’s shockingly effective with no rough abrasive feel (super sensitive skin here). Highly recommend this face wash!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Johnston

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEEEEEEEE THIS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: instantly wipes away dead skin !!! it is incredible skin instantly looks clearer. I do not consider myself to have sensitive skin but I would recommend this product over other exfoliates as it is VERY gentle! It doesn't have much of a smell but when you rub on your face it instantly takes away dead skin! I've never had a product like this..I would recommend only using once a week though because I used it more than once and my skin did become a little dry I think it took off too much dead skin! But i notice much clearer less porous skin after using! My go to exfoliator from now on!
customer_reviews.author: LRAE

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! And those “spit balls” aren’t what you think! (for the better)
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! Ok. If you see the bad reviews saying the balled up little things in your face is plant fiber, or beads, I can with 100% certainty sure that it’s not. What is it? It’s your dead and dry skin. Yes. I know, it’s gross. But guess what? Now with out that on your face you can have smooth, clean, skin. After I used this, my skin was glowing and as smooth as a baby’s butt! This is a really amazing product with ABSOLUTELY NO MICRO BEADS OR CRYSTALS! So that’s that and I would definitely recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: 😁

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, really. I use a lot of products from Bliss and am a huge fan but this one fell short. It comes out in a jelly texture so you think it’ll be easy to run around your face, wrong. Within seconds it feels like it dissolves and then the weird exfoliator that feels like little balls of wet paper towel appear. And by then it’s dry and you’re just smushing these little clumps around on your skin wondering where it all went wrong. Sorry, huge fan of the jelly makeup melt, the peel pads and serums. This ones just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Martorella

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! It takes all the junk out of my pores, and does it very gently. It feels like an expensive spa treatment. You just wet your face and massage the peel in a circular motion on your skin. After about half a minute or so, you rinse it off and see a clean, almost pore-less face. I love it! I also tried it on my lips because my lip balm was not cutting it for my dry skin. It worked for my lips, too! Once I rinsed it off, my lips were baby soft :)
customer_reviews.author: L. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Bro My Sensitive Skin Likes It So It’s a Yes
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and an oily T-zone. I’ve been trying to find chemical exfoliators but I’ve been to scared that if I buy one even if it’s labeled for sensitive skin that my face will scream at me and break out. I bought this instead while waiting for my courage to build up and I was pretty surprised at how well and gentle this product is. My skin hasn’t broken out and I’ve used it twice in one week to see if it will irritate my skin but no, nothing what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Tea Chai

customer_reviews.title: Made pores huge
customer_reviews.text: It's not dead skin it's removing it's the jelly that's balling up on your face, it's sticky to peach fuzz and pulls it really bad like bubble gum stuck to hair, it made my pores huge did not like this product for those reason and also it's NOT a mask at all, you rub it in and have to rinse it off it doesn't peel off like a regular mask would just pills up on your face, think more like sugar scrub but with bubble gum results it's very odd
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff. It’s actually kind of gross, peeling away at your dead skin and then just have it coming off on your hands as you wash. I thought it was a ploy at first, and the wash just had something in it to make it look like you were peeling off dead skin when it was just the actual scrub itself clumping together. So I decided to test it out on my arm where I knew I had no dead skin and nothing! It’s crazy how much dead skin comes off of my face every few days!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Essential new product for my skincare
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the sample size of this when I saw it at the store, but after one use, ordered this full size product! I got so excited because the thought of finding an effective exfoliant that actually cleaned my skin without irritating it had been impossible to find....until now! Not only does this exfoliate, but my skin is baby smooth, brighter, and hydrated. I use it every other day and couldn’t be more thrilled! I like the fact that I can see the dead skin and the product working, but can see how others don’t like feeling that texture. Highly recommend though, worth a try and every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa

customer_reviews.title: Made me glow!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great!!! You can actually feel the dead skin it pulls up... kinda gross but 100% awesome! I have super sensitive skin so I was worried that I would react badly to this peel but it’s so gentle! I only use it 2 times a week max but it always makes me look like I’m glowing when i get out do the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H 93

customer_reviews.title: Interesting product.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a few times but seems good for sensitive skin as I have had no adverse reactions. Is a bit weird the way it works as you are using it... small white clumps form which from what I understand is the products way of removing dead skin cells but I can’t help but be reminded of wet toilet paper pieces!
customer_reviews.author: allimcar

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what this is
customer_reviews.text: I’m not even sure what this is to be honest. When it comes out of the tube its a liquid and you would think it would lather on your face like a liquid does, but it doesn’t. It immediately balls into clumps of something that look like paper and you’re literally just rubbing your rough fingers/paper across your face with no liquid barrier in between for your fingers to glide over? When you wash your face off it feels dirty like there is a layer of residue stuck on it. I’ve never even seen anything like this before. I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Weird Facewash
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once, so I'm not sure how well it works. But it is definitely the weirdest face wash I've ever used. Those little microfiber balls were totally unexpected. I thought it was gross stuff coming out of my pores. I'll continue to use 2x a week hoping it works well. But those little microfiber balls - I'm not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Holland

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! On the BUY AGAIN list!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly got this product on a whim. My skin gets really dry during season so I decided to give this product a try. The "gentle peels" I have used previously acted more like a cleanser to me (which I didn't need). I know it sounds weird, but as I was using the product and cleaning my face, patches of dry skin were pulling away and clumping on my face lol. I let my face rest, put on some moisturizer and went to bed. Got up in the morning and my face looked AMAZING! DEFINATELY A REBUY!
customer_reviews.author: Daisie

customer_reviews.title: The texture is pretty hard to get used to
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have a strong smell IMO. I don't notice a tremendous difference in my skin - as you wash your face the product balls up into little bits of gunk (which is exactly what it advertises that it does, I'm not mad about it) which I thought might feel satisfying but just feels kind of gross. It didn't break me out & it's usable but not holy grail for sure. I'll be moving on to other products.
customer_reviews.author: lenka

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: It does not really exfoliate skin. The particles are from the product, not from the face. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend, not sure why all the rave reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the frutique brand gel exfoliator/peel that I used for years. This is the same type of product but with terrible results. It really doesn't exfoliate at all. It does leave your skin feeling ok after but so would a regular moisturizer. I was looking for a product that would actually make the dead skin come off my face and take away my alligator patches, this didn't do that at all. I ended up throwing this out and buying another brand, which works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: A girl's must have for her beauty routine!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this! Applied on damp face and worked as promised. Fun to use and you get results. I’m going to keep this as one of my favorites. I have sensitive skin and had no problems. Also, great price for the amount of product you receive. I use weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Owens

customer_reviews.title: Gentle exfoliation for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a savior for my beyond sensitive skin! I am unable to use most exfoliating products as they were too harsh. This leaves my face feeling smooth, fresh, and moisturized. It doesn’t cause redness either! The texture is a bit odd do to the fruit fibbers, but works well. This product does NOT contain microbeads of any kind. Those claiming this evidently did not read the description.
customer_reviews.author: Honeyusagi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is gentle, yet it completely clears my face of ruddy skin. Excellent exfoliant. My husband even started using it which is a miracle in itself. Bliss has earned a lifelong customer and I can’t wait to try other products.
customer_reviews.author: Twilightgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for dead skin removal
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It really does take all the dead skin off. I use it not only on my face (and I have sensitive skin) but also on my elbows when they get dry. This lasts so long as well. Would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ammerman

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: This is nice. It’s super non abrasive and cleans makeup off really well. It can leave behind residue if you don’t rinse out your sink/tub after using it but I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Exfoliate
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is cool. Takes off dead skincells without destroying my extremely delicate skin. I can’t even use a retinol but I can manage this product once every two weeks. And I glow afterwards
customer_reviews.author: manon laura

customer_reviews.title: Useless thing
customer_reviews.text: Tried it couple times now, and once you apply it on your skin it's transforming right away into a super "shredded" texture, that can't happen to be dead skin, way too fast, so is just a waste of money. No difference after use and I don't know if it's just me, but the skin after using it feels super dry, that I need moisture right away.
customer_reviews.author: Diane N

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for exfoliating my dry, maturing skin without causing damage. Glad I tried this.
customer_reviews.author: SteepwithAmber

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It takes off all of your dead skin and leaves it glowing. Your skin feels so clean. I suffer from dry skin as well and find that my skin is less itchy when I use this product. I have already ordered 3 times. Love love love this so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Furgerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite!!! I originally got the product as a travel size that was in a target beauty box. I loved it so much I bought 4 more larger bottles! It removes excess skin very easily-and with that being said it can get a little bit gross...but by the end my skin is smooth and clear immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a game changer in skincare! My face has never been this smooth or clean. This is something I'll be using in my skincare routine all the time now. I love it!! Compared to other products that do the same thing, it's half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: NIce Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after reading good reviews and I do have to agree! I really like this product, but I do have to say that it has a little bit of a smell to it. I think it's just the smell of the jelly, but I would still want to know if I was going to be a new customer for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! It gets the dry dead skin off of my face without harsh scrubbing pads that used to irritate my skin and cause breakouts
customer_reviews.author: AprilLynn

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love bliss and this product is cheaper on amazon for some reason. It’s a great product and if you love grapefruit you’ll love this plus it’s 10 bucks and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really seems to ball up the dead, icky skin. I still don’t look like Charlese Theron, but it seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Landfather

customer_reviews.title: This did nothing for me.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice any difference using this. I read and reread the directions hoping I was doing something wrong, but I didn't. However, I can say it's okay for super sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Waechter

customer_reviews.title: Can't get it off!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff stays with you forever, or at least it did with me. I really wanted to like it, but when I use it, I have a really hard time getting the residue and scrubbers off my skin, even with using a toner afterward. I would not buy this stuff ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This seems to do the job. I usually leave it on for a few minutes before washing it off, and this seems to help it work better.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Gentle exfoliator, will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a really nice, gentle exfoliator. I sometimes use a stronger one before this one, but this one seems to clear away small bits of dead skin without being too harsh. I like the way it feels, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pink Magic
customer_reviews.text: I really like this peel. It really gets the dead skin and makeup/product buildup off. It works as good if not better than the other high end peels I have tried. Will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great to add to your Skincare Routine
customer_reviews.text: No harsh particles and great to exfoliate my skin. The dead skin just rolls right off!! A must have for your skin routine!!
customer_reviews.author: Book_loversdreams

customer_reviews.title: Super Gentle
customer_reviews.text: Great exfoliation with no damage. Fair skin has no business using harsh scrubs, but you still want something to remove dead skin and leave your face glowing. This does both with no irritation or redness.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Pure utter magic.
customer_reviews.text: Blew me away. This stuff is magic! When I use it, I do not feel a scrubbing sensation but my dead skin literally rolls off. In combination with a Bliss moisturizer, my skin has never been softer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle and leaves my skin very soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: It’s super gentle! Which is great cause i tend to go overboard when i exfoliate and end up rubbing half the skin off my face. It doesn’t have much of a smell, but it leaves my skin feeling smooth and looking radiant. So far it’s a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: i have lots of build up because of dry skin and this stuff is amazing! i used to use skin food pineapple peeling gel and then all the sudden it was super hard to find. This was my replacement product and im so happy with this! the smell is better and this is so much more moisturizing and less stripping feeling on my skin my makeup goes on flawless after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: hector montanez

customer_reviews.title: Chemical exfoliant
customer_reviews.text: The jelly consistency is weird but definitely takes off the dry skin without using a physical abrasive.
customer_reviews.author: Shu

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Works really well for aging as well as acne skin types. I was a little confused about it when i first squeezed some out but OMG it was great. My skin felt so soft and smooth. I use it two or three times a week. Bliss seems to have a lot of good products. This is another
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Takes off my make up so good! Helped with the cystic scene I’ve been having
customer_reviews.author: Luciano Scarano

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fall for it!
customer_reviews.text: This is not exfoliating at all. The “dirt” people keep taking pictures of is the actual product, that is not coming from your face.
customer_reviews.author: carolina pichardo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this more stars I would. After a week of using this product I order six more. My skin is so soft and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pure magic! I cannot believe the difference this product has made after just one use. I have extremely sensitive skin and this has not caused any issues. I am in awe!
customer_reviews.author: anderh1829

customer_reviews.title: Dead skin just rolls off!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product! Gentle on the skin, unbelievably inexpensive and leaves your face soft for several days after treatment.
customer_reviews.author: California customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought for myself; I'm 73, but have good skin and look much younger. This is a nice, gentle, exfoliater. My 18 year old granddaughter tried and loved it, and now I buy it for her. Keeps her skin clear and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Zorn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This was awful. It balled up and actually got stuck to my peach fuzz which was quite uncomfortable to remove. Immediately got rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Iwerks

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s unfortunate that I ordered this product based on its ratings. This is a pathetic product since i used it twice and it leaves so much stuck to my facial hair and forming small blobs of goop near the jawline. I tried to wash off the goop with soap, oil, vaseline but its very stubborn. I wish i could return this product. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Effective but... weird. It definitely gives you glowing skin and is way less abrasive than an actual scrub. It’s so gentle I use it at least 4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Cox

customer_reviews.title: Found a dupe for expensive Aquareveal
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Far superior to the more expensive but similar Aquareveal Satin Bright. A perfect dupe!
customer_reviews.author: copperlustre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite new product. I buy these for friends and family now.
customer_reviews.author: Carri Moberg

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: This product is no better than what I have used for years. Neutrogena Deep Clean is better, for a quarter of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen Janosko

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and I have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: If you let it dry it’s impossible to get off. No visual difference of skin.
customer_reviews.author: watching

customer_reviews.title: Dried my skin
customer_reviews.text: I like bliss products but this one dried my skin terribly. No use. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Bajaj

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: My partner has extremely flaky dry skin and no other exfoliator has helped. This one works miracles. I'm addicted to exfoliating my own face now because it gets the job done really well - like REALLY well, my skin feels brand new and refreshed after using - without being abrasive. Must have.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to use this product but was very disappointed. Ordered a few products from this line and within days of use I started to break out. Had to throw it in the garbage. Was so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lyndonna A

customer_reviews.title: Not a great smell, hard to rinse the wash off
customer_reviews.text: I’m not fond of the smell at all!!! Product is hard to rinse off as well
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without
customer_reviews.text: This has transformed my skin. Pores are smaller and less breakouts. Makeup looks better. It is so gentle I use it 3xs a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this locally and I wanted it too. This is a much better price and the same quantity. This stuff works like magic!
customer_reviews.author: boo

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I love the peeling effect vs the scrubbing of most exfoliants. However, my skin does feel kind of dry afterwards but once I finish my skincare routine. My skin is soft. I've only used it 3xs but so far it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra C.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, works well
customer_reviews.text: It works better than I thought it would. It’s very gentle and works well. It reminds me of the one of the prestige brand formula. Probably the best exfoliating product you can find in mass market/ drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time, and it's gentle on my face and keeps me from getting blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Really cute packaging, I love that it uses natural ingredients, and the reviews had me hopeful. But product does not work at all. I have flakey skin on my feet that I was hoping would rub it right off. When I stepped out of the shower, absolutely no change. I've tried it a couple times with the same results. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non irritating great product
customer_reviews.text: Did not irritate my sensitive face. Good amount of product for the price. Pulls up surface dead skin cells just like as promised, I will be re-buying in future.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Ente

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, not sure if it moisturized too so I didn’t respond. Removed dead skin cells So area is ready for any kind of moisturizer. I would use it and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Innovative exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: This jelly-like exfoliator is really fun to use as it acts like tiny "lint rollers" for the dead skin on your face. Didn't try out or irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think that this product is fantastic. I have very dry skin, and this removes any and all dead skin. This product leaves my skin super smooth, soft, and moderately moisturized. I do recommend using a moisturizer after this product if you have exceptionally dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Conner

customer_reviews.title: Heavily scented
customer_reviews.text: The smell was terribly off putting. I could only use it once and gave it to my daughter because the smell was so strong and floral it made my head hurt, and I am not sensitive to scents.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bee

customer_reviews.title: Will repurchase! 🙂
customer_reviews.text: The smell was and texture was very strange. In spite of that, my skin was super soft and glowing when I was finished. Just make sure to thoroughly rinse the product off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Owens

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: I've used this about 5 times now and I don't think it's very effective. My face didn't feel more exfoliated or moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: ELewis

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin feels nice
customer_reviews.text: I used it to exfoliate my body but it does not get a lot of exfoliation like I expected. But I like how my skin feel smooth after use.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: It removed all of my blemishes and my scarring as well great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not a deep exfoliant
customer_reviews.text: It was nice and exfoliated my skin, however it did not exfoliate as deep as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Krabs

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, skin feels ok...
customer_reviews.text: I do like the way my skin feels after I use it but I honestly can’t tell if it’s really dead skin balling up and coming off. I do the like the way it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only Product That Unclogs My Pores
customer_reviews.text: I have used everything under the sun. This is the only product I have found that gets my pores clean.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t write reviews, but this stuff is amazing! I could tell a difference in my skin after just one use. My skin is smoother, brighter and looks fresh! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin! My skin felt clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Best Exholiator
customer_reviews.text: I love this. This works and helps your skin feel perfectly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My face always feels squeaky clean after using this. It’s very unique texture and nothing like any exfoliator I’ve ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Really does exfoliate the skin well. But so well you can really only use once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Adorah Petruso

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself some money and rub a handful of spitballs all over your face
customer_reviews.author: Riley Meneses

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for two weeks now and it does nothing and every time I have to use another facial cleanser to wash off the remnants. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh so smooth with out the irritation
customer_reviews.text: Im so glad i came across this peel. It's non drying and its gentle enough to use multiple times a week. It dosent really have a scent. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Tytionna

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Really great face wash, Made my face feel smooth and even textured.
customer_reviews.author: ENEZ

customer_reviews.title: My skin glows!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product! Leaves my skin polished and glowing! I’ve bought for daughters & granddaughters!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy D

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not too impressed, honestly. Didn’t feel like it did anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My face feels so smooth and after just a few uses, my pores appear smaller and not as noticeable!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t wash off
customer_reviews.text: Hard to wash off face. I had to throw it away after the second try.
customer_reviews.author: Akouto Vonwogbe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect non abrasive exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job perfectly, peels off all the dead skin
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Beranek

product_meta.title: Bliss Jelly Glow Peel, Gentle Non-Abrasive Exfoliator With Fruit Enzymes, Cruelty Free, Made Without Parabens, 4 ounces
feature_bullets: GENTLE EXFOLIATION- Pineapple and Papaya enzymes act as non-abrasive exfoliants to help loosen dead skin cells for easy removal.
HYDRATING MOISTURIZER- Seals in hydration by boosting the skin barrier while revitalizing skin cells
DEEP CLEAN- Cellulose plant fibers ball up when they come in contact with oil on your skin, forming soft clumps that cling to dead skin, rolling them away as they are rinsed.
PREMIUM INGREDIENTS- Fruit Enzymes, Cellulose, Coconut Fruit Extract, Pro Vitamin B5, Niacinamide and Sodium Hyaluronate
NO NONSENSE- This product is blissfully free from parabens, phthalates, sulfates, SLS & SLES. All Bliss products are PETA-certified and 100% cruelty-free.
